place_description: Contemporary spot serving high-end coffee drinks, plus tea & light fare like toasts & yogurt.

reviews_data.review_text: Ordered a regular hot vanilla latte for 7$ and tipped 1$, I was expecting the beautiful latte art I saw on their Instagram & google photos but received just a regular latte in a to go cup. Not bad but a bit disappointing especially for the price
Very tasty coffee!

This place has good options for coffee lovers, but they are unable to make a cup of coffee in under 20 minutes unless it's the middle of the day on a weekday.  Even a basic hot chocolate takes that long.  It's clearly a "workflow" issue if you stand around and watch them.  They make one cup at a time, one person at a time. Faster drinks don't get pushed out earlier. It's pretty ridiculous.

The place is really nice... the coffee is OK but overpriced, the staff also gives a good vibe but it is insane that we had to wait 20 minutes for 2 lattes. If I pay 17 bucks for 2 lattes and you have 4 people on call 20 minutes is just rude.
It's inside a food fall. They had seasonal drink options.
Not bad coffee. Had better.
Check the map cambo
We were in the market for dinner & I just had to check this place out. Our coffees were perfectly made & the employee working was just so nice!
Awesome coffee!!!
Amazing, real vanilla beans in their vanilla syrup.
I enjoyed a delicious cappuccino. Very friendly staff. Recommend! I also appreciate they have glassware and cups for dining in instead of paper coffee cups for all.
Good coffee and excellent service! A great place to start the work day
Delicious omelet
The staff was personal and friendly, but most importantly the coffee was absolutely delicious and would recommend going out of your way to get coffee there
Awesome drinks, awesome staff, awesome environment. My coffees were delicious!

We told the we were in a tour we had 15 minutes to get a simple hot chocolate m they took our money and never serve us. They laugh at us. Unacceptable. I will stop the charge on my credit card. Disrespectful. No customer service at all
Great coffee and amazing customer service!
Came here on Sunday morning - they had just coffee in not just coffee, but it was delicious!

Very good vibes and most importantly the coffee was great! I always get a regular hot latte with some simple syrup and they knocked it out of the park!! You have to go into the 7th Street market to find this place. Plenty of space to sit around and have other food.
Delicious specialty coffee
Vanilla Latte was really well made, our Barista was very patient and helpful.  I look forward to coming back
Over priced bad coffee.  Just a No
Vanilla latte with almond milk was great!
Never disappoints, always a go to in Charlotte!

The lady there who took my order was nice initially. And then afterwards I was standing there waiting for my coffee and she put it at the other end of the counter and then when I asked for a straw that fish into the cup to cover it up since I'm walking in the rain she had me a large one for a 16 ounce cup.
Great hot chocolate! Got one in the morning and went back in the afternoon lol.
This coffee shop is located @ the 7th st public market. The server was very polite and courteous. He was fast and efficient. I got a Caramel latte with almond milk and it was PERFECT
Best espresso I've had in a while. It was rich and creamy and I could tell the barista paid attention to detail. Will be returning.
Kofe normal'nyi, malen'kii ob'em. Otsenka 3 iz 5.

Disappointing experience with service today which did not emulate the "love people, not just coffee." No acknowledgement when we sat at the bar, even just to tell us we needed to order at the tablet. Questions were answered with pointing at things, or curt yes/no responses. It was the most unwelcoming experience I've had at a business, particularly in an economy where I consider $6+ coffee a splurge. I have always loved this location and was excited to introduce my friend to the 7th street market vibe.  0/10 for personality, 10/10 for latte skills.

This is the best coffee I have tasted, and I miss coming here, and my review is coming to you after I traveled for work to almost everywhere in the United States and tried so many coffee shops. This is no.1
Got a Latte and Hot chocolate with oat milk and they were both so good! Very creamy (without milk) and I couldn't be happier. The server was awesome and very accommodating, so happy we came in!
Somebody in another review said the drip was bad but it's NOT it's GOOD
Great coffee!
Tried the fig brown sugar latte and it is amazing. Love this coffee shop in the middle of the market, they never disappoint. Everyone is friendly and always have great suggestions.

Fun hip place although the staff seemed to be in a rush without much of a good reason as it wasn't backed up. It was a little expensive but reasonably priced for where it's at.

The picture is an outside view. It's conveniently right by 7th Street Station
Terrible service this afternoon.  Rude barista.

I am sorry to say that costumer service here is not in their daily goal. I ordered an ice latte, and the lady just pour the coffee, the ice and let my cup sit forever.
After taking care of two more costumers, I asked her if she could discard the water on top(ice+ time melting= watery coffee?). She just gave me the look, did it and her attitude was the most unpleasant experience from then on.
We waited for the whole order at a table, and when everything was delivered, on purpose this same lady walked by, she went to the furthest table possible, and left the order back there, yelling my name to go and pick it.
I regret having tipped them. I regret going to a place where people don't want to do their job
IT'S A NO COMING BACK, at all!
Taste coffee is awesome. It is NOT like in some other places where they use charcoal instead of coffee.
incredibly friendly staff who make every visit enjoyable.
Could not have been faster and more friendly service!! AWESOME. Cute little spot just inside the market.
When you like an Americano but just need a basic, no frills, iced coffee.
Awesome place and phenomenal drinks, got a special latte and special matcha lemonade, both delicious!!
Caramel latte is made to perfection

Really good coffee in the middle of uptown Charlotte. It is located inside the building, market - and you can see them in the middle. Very nice staff and they even design the froth for a lovely experience. Highly recommend.
Ice chai latte with oatmilk was perfect!

Sorry, but I can't be the only one that thinks the coffee is overroasted and tastes like sour milk.  The first time I had it, I thought maybe it was just me.  Nope. I've had it at multiple locations and times.  Same nasty sour taste.
Excellent coffee, little bit of a wait... but, we all agreed it was worth the wait.
Great coffee and service was awesome, thank you so much Ken!

Coffee is great! Customer service is blah... they don't look happy to be there, didn't tell me about their 20% off Apple Pay discount & couldn't tell me about the ingredients in their muffins (child has severe egg allergy). Just shrugged and said I don't know.
Hour and a half still no coffee. Thanks
Very limited options, one size coffee only. Very few offerings of food (1.scone or 2 types fried pie) although it is in a busy food court type setting with pizza, pasta etc. No breakfast foods here.
Ordered an almond milk latte 6.25 after tax. Delicious, worth every penny!
Great coffee and staff!
This was the best iced coffee I've had in a long time. It really brightened my day. They also validate parking. A bonus is they have 20% off on Wednesdays when using Apple Pay!

The best mocha latte I've ever had. So chocolately, perfect temperature, and refreshing! I typically just chug my coffee because I don't really like the taste but need the caffeine. This time around, I slowly drank this latte and truly enjoyed every sip
The place looks amazing but couldn't pay cash! NO LONGER TAKES CASH.
Good iced coffee
Great Coffee? Cute market!

I'm a hardcore coffee/espresso lover and decided to order something different. I ended up ordering the Bhakti Chai with oatmilk. So yummy! It has a slight ginger spicy kick to it. The staff were very nice and being greeted by smiling faces is always greatly appreciated.
Lots of options. Tried a caramel latte and a cortado. Both were great!

Rude employees. Went to go get a coffee. It said online they were open. There were several people sitting down with coffee cups from NOt just coffee.

When I went up to order three employees were sitting on their phones. One employee rudely says "can I help you?" I stated my order and he rudely claims they were open. When clearly ybey were.
I usually just order a regular cup of drip coffee. They didn't have that. But they were patient and figured out a good coffee to make an americano for me, and it was delicious.
The latte was perfect. Friendly and prompt service. It's inside the 7th St Market.

I was visiting Charlotte for the weekend and stopped by for a cup of coffee. The atmosphere and the quality of the coffee was astounding! I ordered the brown sugar praline as a cappuccino and it tasted almost like a dessert. So good!!
Was visiting Charlotte for the weekend and stopped in for my coffee fix. Had the brown sugar praline lattee.....was AMAZING

I have always had excellent coffee every time I've been. Most recently I tried their seasonal cappuccino, a brown sugar praline one I believe. It was one of the best cappuccino I've had and Alice, the barista, made it perfectly! I'm definitely going to be sad to see that leave the menu (so maybe think about making it a mainstay).
Such a homie coffee joint with excellent staff and wonderful location

We typically go to the location on Jay Street and always love it but this time we wanted to try 7th street location. The baristas are NOT good at all, they seem to be careless/distracted and made both are coffees too sweet with liquid sweetener.
Not Just Coffee really good coffee in the town.
Delicious caramel latte! Barely had to take a picture it was so moreish
Good coffee but not so friendly service. Lattes are a bit overpriced and there's only one size option for drinks.
Good coffee and fast and efficient, and great flavor for their roast!
Great barista
Absolutely delicious espresso drinks!!
Kevin is great! Enjoyed my chai.

Having worked at a coffee shop, this place does a good job of serving their drinks.  Clean and thorough.   The location works well and the staff was kind.  I went about 2pm on a Saturday and it was not too busy
Great coffee and good people
Don't order Masala Chai unless you want overpriced pre-made mix from a carton.
Latte good, but not the best coffee.

Cute place inside the market; however we were here for the coffee.  We ordered a cortado and the milk was very nicely prepared; the espresso was underdeveloped from the roaster.  While I love a light roast espresso that is roasted well, this was truly SOUR, not bright, sour.  They serve coffee from counter culture, not a fan.
Great pour over Kenyan coffee. Great black cherry sweetness with well balanced citrus acidity.

A nice compliment to the offerings of 7th Street station, Not Just Coffee offers an array of drinks from a typical cup of joe, cold brew or hot, to seasonal latte's and hard to find chai's.  I typically do not drink coffee after a certain time of day but if I find myself in 7th Street Station then I often find myself buying a cup and saving it for the next day, though not as good the next day its still better than anything I have at home.

The staff is quick to take your order and just a quick getting your drink made.  I rarely have to wait more than two or three minutes for my drink, even when it's busy.
Best coffee and baristas in uptown
Honestly the best latte I've ever had
Great coffee and they usually source from local roasters. Great lattes for a caffeine based treat.
Their latte has just a hint of either cloves or cardamom. I thought it tasted lovely.

This place is nestled inside a large building with several other businesses by the railroad tracks.

It boasts large wooden tables and bar seating right across from the baristas.

The coffee is really good and if you need to sweeten it up a little bit they have simple sugar and honey syrup available nearby. I recommend the cappuccino. If you get a latte, get one with flavoring otherwise it just tastes like milk.
Some of the best coffee I've ever had and a great place for a first date!

Update: Oat milk latte was not exceptional. I don't know if that's oat milk's fault but could be why.

Original Review: They make the best and most consistent quality latte or cappuccino. Hex Coffee is also good I just haven't been enough times.
one of my favorite date, study, and chill spots! delicious coffee, unique ambiance, and wonderful baristas.
Words cannot describe how amazing this place is. Truly some of the best coffee in town.
Best coffee in Charlotte and in a cool environment. Take the time to try a pourover from the rotating selections. Good wifi too in the market.
This place is amazing for many reasons. Their drinks are above a 5 star rating. The workers are true artisans. The atmosphere is undescribable. I highly recommend it.
Very nice place different places inside
The surroundings is lovely, amazing little spot with enough seating internal and out. Great service!! Has nice outdoor chairs with a another location for people to study and chill.
Good coffee. Offers nothing to eat though. Anyway there are a few options around. So, I would say it is "Just Coffee" here :)
Busy location, drinks take a while but they usually taste the same quality as the other locations.
Great experience and an extremely fine cup of coffee! Creative brews, perfect ambience.  Staff is professional and excellent at their craft.
Great craft coffee with local offerings.
Coffee is perfect every single time. The baristas are great.
Had their coffee at 3 different locations and it is never been good. Just standard brewed coffee. Atmosphere is hip.
Barista was very friendly and the mocha was fantastic! My husband was quite impressed with the foam art.
Great coffee and tea selection! Love the effort to reduce plastic waste with the option of paper and metal straws. Fantastic anchor to the 7th Street Marlet.
Mitch just made me the most amazing shaken oat milk latte extravaganza, it rocked my world.
Expensive but high quality!
Staff is great and their coffee has been the best for years.

Love coming to this location of Not Just Coffee! I think it's my favorite one to go to because the park is right across the street. Their caramel latte is legit one of the best if not the best in Charlotte. Be sure to check them out!
Neat place that has been in 7th Street market since the beginning. You can grab a togo or drink in a glass. I believe they only have 1 size drink. Quick walk from most places.
Outstanding coffee! They really take pride in what they are doing. Friendly and very informative staff. Recommend this place if you wanna relax, unplug and blow your taste buds!

Probably my favorite coffee seller in charlotte. I wouldn't call this location a coffee shop because it's located inside 7th Street Public Market. It's more of a "coffee bar". Their brew is 80% consistent. Depends on who's working and if they are trying a new bean. One thing I find a bit frustrating is that they sometimes put ice inside the half and half bottle which waters it down and makes my coffee taste bland instead of creamy. Would love if they ban that practice. Otherwise, excellent coffee and friendly staff.
Good espresso drinks
Great coffee and even greater staff. Very relaxed and chill environment.
Hands down my favorite coffee in Charlotte. Everything I've ever had has been great!! I love, love this place!
Best place to get coffee, my favorite.
Although they are "not just coffee" that is usually what I go for! Their coffee is great and it is a cute place.

From the name I was hoping I could maybe also get some pizza or a home appliance or a small business loan or who knows what! But it turns out the only thing they have in additon to good coffee is tea.... and friendly service!
It is in an indoor market with other vendors that do offer food though.
Espresso is absolutely phenomenal. Like so good that you hate that it's so good because you hold all other coffee up to a higher standard.

I came by very late one day during a busy weekend, and the staff was still very friendly and welcoming! They made some amazing coffee for my boyfriend and I and didn't mind that we hung out while they were closing up. Plus their location is really beautiful!
Nice environment, good service and coffee. Like sitting at the bar
The nitro coffee is amazing. The shop is set up like a little bar area. It's a really relaxed scene.
Great coffee and super nice and knowledgable staff.
Great coffee and even greater staff. Very relaxed and chill environment. Coffee doesn't break the bank either!
Great espresso!
Delicious and knowledge and friendly
This is my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte and the staff is very friendly!
Love latte :)
Hot chocolate is good af

Fantastic coffee, one of the best in Charlotte. Don't expect to order and go, these guys know flavor is King and a good cup takes time to brew! Priced a little higher than your ordinary cup but I'm sure you'll agree it's worth it.
Great coffee and friendly staff.
Absolutely fantastic coffee, delicious, froth art included. Wonderful folks working there as well. I had the mocha latte and my wife had a vanilla latte. Both were great.
Great Coffee and wonderful customer service!
The best coffee spot in Charlotte period.  Worth every effort to get coffee there- but due to difficulty of getting there.. I don't get to go as often as I want.
This location is inside of the Public Market. Simple menu, great coffee, well staffed. Most available nearby parking is pay parking.
Love the espresso as well as the atmosphere yes
Great vibe and good mocha
Vanilla Latte was very smooth and creamy
Very delicious and convenient.

My service was a great experience a little slow but delicious coffee!
Of course the weekends are very busy which was my fault for rushing but definitely recommend their cappuccinos.
Their nitro cold brew coffee is fantastic. It quickly became a regular stop for me when downtown.
The iced caramel latte is just delish. They make it in house.
Best I've found in clt

Best coffee and WiFi (18/18 Mbps) but limited seating means working from here might be tough on week days. The name refers to how good they are at coffee because there really isn't much else on the menu other than coffee ironically
I just love be the nutty Caramel Latte

Wow! What a wonderful experience I had last night at Not Just Coffee! I was needing something sweet, so after getting some pie at another shop right next door, I had to have some good coffee to compliment it. Not Just Coffee fixed me up good! Kenya was so pleasant and made me an outstanding cup of coffee. It wasn't over sweet and it wasn't over strong, it was just perfect! I loved this place, Kenya was so warm and pleasant it makes me want to go back everyday just to have her work her magic! The hardest thing is going back to Wilmington where I can't seem to find a good coffee shop like this and the others in Uptown Charlotte. I'll be sure to stop here every time I visit there!
Great Service, Great coffee, fun market place to visit. Highly recommend
NJC is the best coffee chain in CLT. This isn't my fav location but is the original.
Excellent coffee and service . The latter was amazingly good.
Great iced cappuccino. Even better staff. Kenya is a truly lovely woman. Thank you and wish you all the best, Kenya.
Great coffee! They also have oat milk which makes the lattes taste way better.
I can't get enough of this cute little place
Loved the cappuccino
Great coffee and people!  Wish I they had a location in Lake Norman area.
I can't say enough great things about Not Just Coffee!  The owners, staff and the quality of the ingredients used is top-notch.
Ok coffee
Nicest people in all the land. They lift me up when I am down. The coffee is just as awesome. It's an art not just putting coffee in a cup.
Great lattes! Good service but always busy on the weekends! Prices aren't too bad and I go here often!

Ive been here 5 days in a row... I LOVE tea but when it comes to coffeee tbis place is mu FAVORITE go to!! Best coffee ive ever had and they offer oat milk which is just delicious and creamy in the homemade caramel latte... cant wait to visit again!
Best coffee in Charlotte

Really good coffee shop inside the 7th Street Public Market in Charlotte. First of all, I love the public market. I am happy that Charlotte has one (even though it doesn't rival in size of larger cities). I think you can get a lot of quality stuff here!

At Not Just Coffee they have a good range of drinks. They have 3 different types of chai lattes which impressed me :). The one I had was delicious.

The baristas were super friendly, knowledgeable, and attentive, even in the midst of a rush. I'm a huge Counter Culture Coffee fan, and they know how to take Hologram and single origins and make it taste fantastic.

Specifically, the cappuccino had the perfect amount of microfoam, aeration, and color contrast in a perfectly poured swan.

This is the best coffee I have ever tasted in the US. I am a barista from Amsterdam, where almost all coffee places (even chains, except from Starbucks) are serving this high-quality coffee to it's citizens. In my opinion, this type of coffee shops should be widely known in the US. I hope places like this will wake up America!

The location and atmosphere is wonderful, but the coffee was poor. The person taking the order did not know a Cubano from an americano, but insisted they could make a flat white. The flat whites were made like lattes. The espresso for the flat whites and the straight shots tasted burnt. When Starbucks makes a better shot, you have to be doing something wrong. They also don't have whipped cream, at all. I hope this was an isolated incident, but according to my barista friend (who got the plain shot) their machine had to be way off to pull shots that bad.

The best coffee hands down in Charlotte. The coffee has such a complex flavor. And they make their own chocolate sauce for the mocha latte's. I love how when I get to the bottom of my mocha, it tastes like drinking chocolate so I get two beverages in one.  And the staff are super friendly and talented!!
I love this place! Hands down the best coffee.
Great vibe and great coffee! Employees were very kind and helpful. I will definitely be returning, this is my new favorite coffee shop!!
The coffee was great. The coffee shop is very clean and great services.
We went to the wrong store but this one was neat. Inside a shopping center. Very good coffee
Great coffee
Very busy place but coffee was great!!!!! Like the way it suppose to be!
Great coffee in a great location. Both the coffee and the flavoured drinks are quite tasty
Good coffee
Delicious!
We're out of chocolate when I went but the hubs loved his!
Kenya Augerson is an excellent Barista and knows her way around coffee. With excellent time management skills. Her ability to multi task with orders and customer with a slew is what I like most.

Situated within the market they have chairs to sit up at the bar so you can take away or chill out and enjoy your coffee.

They have a variety of coffees whether you're after espresso or pour over. The nitro in particular is great.

They also do a selection of teas and have kombucha on tap.

Service is quick and friendly - we loved it here.
Very knowledgeable and friendly staff. They use Counter Culture coffee. Excellent espresso. The best Nitro Cold Brew we have had.
Try the featured toast it's always amazing!

Super disappointed in the service and quality. Had heard great things about this place and went out of our way to try it yesterday. Asked for light ice in my cold brew - (politely reminding her when she was filling up the cup too full.) Barista rolled her eyes at me, rudely tossing the ice into the sink. Not the kind of treatment I expected for the supposed "best coffee in Charlotte."
This place is always packed!
Good coffee, and friendly staff. The "Espresso Mule" was something new and refreshing, though their somewhat more standard espresso drinks were well pulled also.
Great coffee. We need to replace many of the chain coffee shops with these types. Loved the coffee and the people are great
Wow! What a cool little store front! Warm and cozy! My coffee and toast where definitely made with love. Staff is great and very friendly.
Super cool environment. Great coffee.
Tres bon cafe, le lieu cohabite avec des commercant en tout genre.
The most amazing caramel latte!
Bar seating in the Public Market. Wide range of coffees and teas.
They do not sell food? But there is pictures of food.
The Caramel  latte is off the chain!

What's there to complain about?! Counter Culture coffee, pulled well and in an amazing atmosphere. 'Nuff said :)

Go enjoy and while you're there check out some of the other shops nearby. Very very cool atmosphere. Reminiscent of Chelsea Market in NYC.
Coffee bar with multiple brewing options in the 7th Street market
Love
Good but slow
Good coffee in uptown though not very comfortable as it seems more of a stall in 7th Street Market than its own standalone coffee shop
This place is amazing. Their caramel lattes are a must try! (Legend has it they make their own caramel sauce)

The pour over is amazing. I drink it black and don't add a thing. It's incredible to taste the different notes of flavor from the coffee beans and roast profile. Too often we are drinking burnt, unbalanced, or bad tasting coffee that we then cover up with milk and sugar. The vibe here is inspiring. I love the open doors and sort of outdoor indoor blend.

This is some of the best espresso I've ever had. They offer much higher quality coffee than you will find at your typical coffee chain. It is not a standalone shop, it's in the 7th street market. A fun environment with lots of cool things to do nearby.
Arguably the best cup of coffee in Charlotte
The best latte in Charlotte hands down. Also try their nitro brew if you're in the mood for something kinda crazy!
Best COFFEE in Charlotte
Cold brew is okay, not the best around. Long lines on Sunday but I'll give something else a try next time.
Normally I am your typical Starbucks lover, but this place is fantastic! Such good coffee and really cool atmosphere. The baristas are the coolest in town.
Excellent and cheerful service. Coffee was tasty. I got the nitro cold brew and it was solid. I recommend it.
Really enjoyed the new look. Staff was fun and friendly.
Great coffee and great service both at this location and at the new store front!
As the name implies, coffee is an art. Each cup is made with precision and ready for a photo-op when served - unless you take it to go, then it comes in a hand-stamped, paper to-go cup. Delicious.
Coffee done right. Get woke.

Barista was pretty damn rude. I used to live in Portland Oregon so I figured I'd probably like this place...
These are not real hipsters, they're just weird AF.
Also if you don't tip them for literally pouring a cold brew on ice they will glare at you until you leave.
Second time I've given this place a chance, and the second time I was dissatisfied. Not returning.
But hey if all that's what you're interested in you'll probably like this place.
Also, the cold brew was nasty.
Best coffee, hands down.
Good food and more importantly good coffee.
I had my first cold brew nitro coffee and was not disappointed.  Also any place that sells Counter Culture and uses real vanilla beans gets great marks in my book.

I had the BEST vanilla bean sugar latte from this cool spot inside of 7th Street Public Market (another cool place to visit and get lost in). Loved the quick service and I was lucky enough to snag a seat on the counter to watch all the barista action...baristas in action, making coffee. ;)
This is the best cup of coffee in CLT.   Great atmosphere in the open market.
My favorite coffee in the city. The mocha is next level good.
Loved their nitro cold brewed coffee. Reminds me of ginger beard coffee in downtown Tampa
Nice place to enjoy coffee and the local atmosphere. Quite busy on a Saturday afternoon. Thanks!
Vanilla breve latte was amazing! I would definitely come again!

Great, fresh, Onyx and Counter Culture coffee and people. I want to leave five stars but the typical process was in place: start the pour over, help other customers, pour over is crap. Next time I'll just go ten minutes out-of-the-way for smelly cat.
The latte made me really happy.

Just the best coffee by the best people.
Hope you enjoy the trip Miracle!

Wonderful coffee, you can really taste the extra care they put into each cup. The iced mocha is the best go-to, but if the Foggy London Town is in season, you HAVE to try it. Best latte I've ever had, hands down.
Although there's nothing overly special about the coffee, (It's still good though) the atmosphere more than makes up for it. It's a great place to be productive at or to take a date to.
First time here and I'm new to drinking good coffee.  The employee here was very patient when helping me pick a coffee to try.  Would definitely come back.

Was more about the "look and feel" of the place then the quality of the coffee and service. Being from out of town and o ly up to see the family.was looking for a good place to just sit and have some coffee. The coffee was good, but there is better out there for less money. The service, we'll just not there at all. Not going to be a place I will be going back to when I am in town. I will stick with Smelly Cat coffee, better coffee and WAY better service.

Expert baristas armed with top of the line equipment, counter culture beans and house made adjuncts. Quality rules over quantity with small servings and high prices for the area but worth it in my opinion. Hipster vibe with available bar and table seating inside the 7th Street market. No food except brucs bars.

Wonderful tiny, tiny, tiny cup of $5 latte espresso. It was good coffee, but can I be honest? I was a bit surprised an 8oz coffee cost $5 bucks. They probably need to rethink either the size or pricing. I mean... it's just coffee.
Hot coffee.
Awesome!
I had a regular Cappuchino, it was very thick and smooth, didn't need any sugar. Best coffee I've had in America so far. Hard to find by the map but totally worth the search once found.

Slooooooow service... I waited about 12-15 minutes to be told that my drink was 3 orders back in line, despite not many people being around me me waiting for their orders. Coffee was pretty decent, but not the best I've had (not even the best I've had in the past few weeks). Considering the high expectations I set for this place, I'd call it a disappointment. The market area where the cafe is located, however, is pretty charming. Summary: good, but absolutely overrated.
Best latte I have had in North Carolina. They really pay attention to all of the small details that go into making excellent, fresh espresso drinks.
Their iced coffee is pretty good, but at $4-$5 a pop it's definitely on the pricey side.
told husband it's the best carmel latte ever...he now is a believer!!  best latte beat ambiance.
Best coffee in Charlotte! I recently went to NYC and intentionally visited many of the best coffee shops there. NJC is equal to or better than most of the top locations in NYC.

This place is amazing! I live an hour away and my mom and I talk about this place all the time about driving all the way here for our coffee... it's THAT good. Try the caramel latte. Made in house. Don't expect it to be as fast as coffee at McDonalds (yuck) ... this is not just coffee... it's art! :) We'll be back here any time we're in town!

Being from Seattle where there is a coffee shop on every corner i am super impressed with thr quality and staff's attention to detail while making drinks. Will be making a few more visits before I return home.
The Carmel lattes are to die for.
Excellent pour over coffee! Great service. Cool atmosphere inside of an indoor market. Great coffee bar! Would suggest to anyone in uptown Charlotte!
The lattes are great. Ask for a double shot, though.
Amazing coffee. I love the caramel latte and my wife usually gets the iced version. The staff is always extremely friendly and the latte art is fun!
The caramel latte was bonkers
Outstanding espresso blend with caramel and hazelnut notes. Clean finish. Took home some beans and we'll be buying more online. Thanks from the bottom of my cup!
By far the best coffee I've had outside of South America. Pretty quick service. They also make their own Caramel too
When it comes to coffee they don't mess around.

Please stop comparing Starbucks to this place. NJC is on a different planet. The skilled baristas pay close attention to each individual cup they produce. It's not mass produced and sitting there getting stale like the traditional coffee houses. The espresso shots are great because they use quality beans that are roasted correctly and not burnt. It may take 5-10 minutes to get a cup (depending on how busy), but it's worth it. Go here and get great coffee and support local business.
I walk out of my way passing Starbucks to come here.  Coffee is outstanding and so is the service.  If you appreciate good coffee head to seventh street market and stop in.
Very good coffee and friendly staff.
Best coffee in charlotte
Darn good coffee!
Five star coffee, five star service.
